attributes.action: Upgrade the A1079 between York and Hull to Dual Carriageway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The A1079 between York and Hull is the busiest A class road in the East Riding. Recently it was named as one of the most dangerous roads in Britain. The route is desperately in need of upgrade to a dual carriageway to improve road safety and reduce the number of fatalities.
